dict.acceptation: 高度地；极，非常；非常赞许地；

sent.orig: Aerostatic bearing has highly rotating precision and widely applies to the highly precision processing equipment.
sent.trans: 空气轴承以其回转精度高而广泛地应用于高精密加工设备。

sent.orig: Stress seems to be caused by highly technical, highly rushed modern way of life.
sent.trans: 看起来压力是由高科技，高节奏的现代生活方式所引起的。

sent.orig: Effectively managing a ventilator today is a highly-specialized procedure requiring art, science, and highly specialized tools.
sent.trans: 今天有效地管理一套通风设备是需要艺术，科学的一个高度专业化的程式，并且高度专业化工具。

sent.orig: So the highly valued power has impeded the course of highly praised law.
sent.trans: 固有的“贵势”传统阻碍了“尚法”的进程。

sent.orig: Do you treat the highly likely as certain and the highly unlikely as impossible?
sent.trans: 你是否把“可能性高”看作“确实”，把“可能性低”看作“不可能”？
